blueprint_book.label: Brian's City (v4.0.2)
blueprint_book.description:
Self-Building Mega-Base
https://factorioprints.com/view/-MNZWdWosuqr3vtaC2hD

4.0.2:
* Fixed request glitch when Construction Site in recycling.
* Fixed blue loader lubricant intake in Blue Mall.
* Fixed fast loader input of basic loader in Blue Mall.
* Fixed provide threshold in Advanced Circuits.

Completely compatible with SBF v3.X; will just have an extra signal along some edges.
